wikipedia_page.main:
John Keith Oxley Arbuthnott, 17th Viscount of Arbuthnott,  (born 18 July 1950) is a Scottish peer and businessman.He was educated at Fettes College and North Scotland College of Agriculture. Although entitled to live at the ancestral home in the family estate, Arbuthnott House at Laurencekirk, Inverbervie, he has given this to his son and his family to stay in. Instead, he and his wife live in the former manse of Arbuthnott Parish Church, which is adjacent to the church building.
He serves as an elder within the Kirk Session of Arbuthnott, Bervie & Kinneff Parish Church.

response: * Keith Arbuthnott, 17th Viscount of Arbuthnott (born 1950), peer and businessman
